titleStmt.title: The Actes of the Apostles, translated into Englyshe metre, and dedicated to the kynges moste excellent maiestye, by Christofer Tye, Doctor in musyke, and one of the gentylmen of hys graces moste honourable chappell, wyth notes to eche chapter, to synge and also to play vpon the lute, very necessarye for studentes after theyr studye, to fyle theyr wyttes, and also for all Christians that cannot synge, to reade the good and Godlye storyes of the lyues of Christ hys Apostles
titleStmt.author: Tye, Christopher, 1497?-1572.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Nycolas Hyll, for Wyllyam Seres],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
